channel.title: [PI] Adding Models [PI]
channel.description:
Can someone help me over teamviewer just one time is all I ask. I have tried so many different methods and they just will not work. Please post here or PM me if you can help.
EDIT: Do I have to add the item to item.cfg for it to show up not invisible? EDIT2: That did not work so can someone please help me over teamviewer? EDIT3: FIXED! I had to enable pre-loading and increase the modelindex to 1!

item.title: [PI] Adding Models [PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_kasoy_II Sohail
item.description:
@I_kasoy_II wrote:

First you need this.

public void models() { System.out.println("Dumping models.."); for(int ModelIndex = 0; ModelIndex < 50000; ModelIndex++) { byte[] abyte0 = getModel(ModelIndex); if(abyte0 != null && abyte0.length > 0) { decompressors[1].method234(abyte0.length, abyte0, ModelIndex); pushMessage("Model added successfully!", 0, ""); } } System.out.println("Finished."); }

Then this

if(inputString.equals("::Dumpmodels")) models();
Then you need models&ints
The ints go in itemdef2.java
The models go to your cache > raw folder > paste them in there
Then ingame do exactly ::Dumpmodels

Restart your client and its done.

Note this is for galkons renamed

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding Models [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Football1smylife Football1smylife
item.description:
@Football1smylife wrote:

Can someone help me over teamviewer just one time is all I ask. I have tried so many different methods and they just will not work. Please post here or PM me if you can help.

EDIT: Do I have to add the item to item.cfg for it to show up not invisible?
EDIT2: That did not work so can someone please help me over teamviewer?
EDIT3: FIXED! I had to enable pre-loading and increase the modelindex to 1!
